document.full_text: french finance minister christine lagarde pledged to push reforms to give brazil and other emerging economies more influence at the international monetary fund as she kicked off a worldwide tour on monday to win support for her candidacy to lead the global lender.
document.title: lagarde pledges imf reform in bid to woo brazil
lines_and_colors: french finance minister christine lagarde pledged to push reforms to give brazil and other emerging economies more influence at the international monetary fund as she kicked off a worldwide tour on monday to win support for her candidacy to lead the global lender.
